items.text_for_match: Arsenal reward keeper Raya with improved deal Arsenal reward goalkeeper David Raya with an improved contract to underline his status as one of Mikel Arteta's key players. items.ja: This is why we tried to be gentle - Guardiola on Rodri injury
items.en: This is why we tried to be gentle - Guardiola on Rodri injury
items.text_for_match: This is why we tried to be gentle - Guardiola on Rodri injury Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola hopes Rodri will not be sidelined for longer than “two or three weeks” after the midfielder was forced off in the first half of Sunday’s victory over Brentford. Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola hopes Rodri will not be sidelined for longer than “two or three weeks” after the midfielder was forced off in the first half of Sunday’s victory over Brentford.

items.ja: 'I deeply hurt people by moving to Saudi Arabia'
items.en: 'I deeply hurt people by moving to Saudi Arabia'
items.text_for_match: 'I deeply hurt people by moving to Saudi Arabia' In an interview with BBC Sport, Ashleigh Plumptre says she regrets losing the trust of some LGBT fans in women's football by moving to Saudi Arabia. items.ja: Delays, distrust, dynamic prices - how 'welcoming' will World Cup be?
items.en: Delays, distrust, dynamic prices - how 'welcoming' will World Cup be?
items.text_for_match: Delays, distrust, dynamic prices - how 'welcoming' will World Cup be? BBC Sport explores the issues which could make fans feel less than welcome when the World Cup takes place in the United States next year.
